verbose_text: 46 Sustained phosphorylation of eIF2alpha (by PERK or other kinases) leads to upregulation of the transcription factors ATF4, that targets genes involved in antioxidant activities including glutathione synthesis 47, and CHOP that promotes ER stress related cell death responses.
